text: Alloh Zote ast, ki hamai şumoro az jak şaxs ʙijofarid, (ki on padari şumo Odam ast.) Va az Odam zanaşro (Havvoro) ʙijofarid, to ʙa ū oromiş joʙad. Cun ʙo ū daromext, ʙa ʙore saʙuk ʙordor şud va cande ʙo on rūzgorro ʙa sar ʙurd. Va cun ʙor vaznin gardid, on du nafar, Alloh, Parvardigori xeşro ʙixondand, ki agar moro farzande şoista dihī, az siposguzoron xohem ʙud
